Container.changes: [center][img width='460px' src='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ninthwalker/docker-templates/master/brentsflix/images/slack-square.png'][/center] [center][font size=4]slack-invite Changelog[/font][/center] [b]03MAR2017:[/b] Initial unRAID Template release[br]
Container.Name: slack-invite
Container.Description: This is a Docker for a public \"Slack Invite\" page.[br] It Creates a web based portal where users can request access to your slack team automatically.[br] Forked from original creators page at: https://github.com/outsideris/slack-invite-automation[br][br] [b][span style=\'color: #E80000;\']Change the variables to your own:[/span][/b][br] [b]COMMUNITY_NAME[/b] : Your Slack team name. ie: myslackteam [br][br] [b]SLACK_URL[/b] : URL of team. ie: myslackteam.slack.com[br][br] [b]YOUR-ACCESS-TOKEN[/b] : Easiest way is to create a test token from here:[br] https://api.slack.com/custom-integrations/legacy-tokens[br][br] Access Slack-Invite site at http://unraidIP:7879[br] Full info on github site: https://github.com/ninthwalker/slack-invite[br]
Container.Overview: Creates a simple webpage for Slack invite signups
